notesStmt.note: Written in reply to "The right of tythes asserted and proved, &c." by Thomas Comber, and "A vindication of the Friendly conference, &c." attributed by some to Edward Fowler, Bishop of Gloucester; both books being in answer to Ellwood's "Truth prevailing". Cf. BM.
